{"id":1013436203,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691290849,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1013436203/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if it is Possible to Split Array","memory":"17.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool canSplitArray(vector<int>& nums, int m) {\n        if(nums.size()==1||nums.size()==2){\n          return true;\n         \n        }\n        int f=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){\n            if(nums[i]+nums[i+1]>=m){\n                f=1;\n            }\n        }\n        if(f==0)return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-it-is-possible-to-split-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
